SEARCH
Package vendingmachine.utilities

Class VendingMachineUtilities

java.lang.Object
vendingmachine.currency.Currency
vendingmachine.utilities.VendingMachineUtilities
public class VendingMachineUtilities extends Currency
Provides utility methods for the vending machine operations. This class handles user input, coin calculations, purchase processing, and checking the vending machine's stock status. It extends the Currency class to access coin values.

  • Method Details

    • getAmountPaid

      public static int getAmountPaid()
      Gets the total amount paid by the user.
      Returns:
      The amount paid in cents.

    • setAmountPaid

      public static void setAmountPaid(int amountPaid)
      Sets the total amount paid by the user.
      Parameters:
      amountPaid - The amount paid in cents.

    • getVendingMachineEmptyFlag

      public static int getVendingMachineEmptyFlag()
      Gets the flag indicating whether the vending machine is empty.
      Returns:
      0 if empty, 1 otherwise.

    • setVendingMachineEmptyFlag

      public static void setVendingMachineEmptyFlag(int vendingMachineEmptyFlag)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the vending machine is empty.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachineEmptyFlag - 0 if empty, 1 otherwise.

    • getProductIndex

      public static int getProductIndex()
      Prompts the user to enter the index of the product they want to buy. Validates the input to ensure it's within the valid range of product indices.
      Returns:
      The valid product index entered by the user.

    • getCoin

      public static String getCoin()
      Prompts the user to enter a coin (NIKEL, DIMES, or QUARTER). Validates the input to ensure it's a valid coin type.
      Returns:
      The valid coin string entered by the user.

    • calculateInsertedCoinsValue

      public static void calculateInsertedCoinsValue(String insertedCoin)
      Calculates the value of the inserted coin and adds it to the total amount paid.
      Parameters:
      insertedCoin - The string representation of the coin inserted (e.g., "NIKEL", "DIMES", "QUARTER").

    • getTotalAmountFromUser

      public static void getTotalAmountFromUser()
      Prompts the user to insert coins until they indicate they are done. Calculates the total value of the inserted coins.

    • calculateChange

      public static int calculateChange(int cost)
      Calculates the change to be returned to the user after a purchase. Handles cases of insufficient payment, exact payment, and overpayment. Resets the amount paid after calculation.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the product being purchased.
      Returns:
      A flag indicating the sufficiency of the amount paid (Flag.INSUFFICIENTAMOUNT or Flag.SUFFICIENTAMOUNT).

    • buy

      public static void buy(Products product)
      Processes the purchase of a product if sufficient payment is made. Dispenses the product, updates its quantity, and provides feedback to the user.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be purchased.

    • purchase

      public static void purchase(Products product) throws MalformedURLException, InterruptedException
      Initiates the purchase process for a selected product. Checks product availability, gets payment from the user, and completes the purchase.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be purchased.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If a malformed URL has occurred (not directly used here but propagated).
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while sleeping (not directly used here but propagated).

    • vendingMachineEmpty

      public static void vendingMachineEmpty(Products p1, Products p2, Products p3)
      Checks if the vending machine is out of stock for all products. Sets the vendingMachineEmptyFlag accordingly.
      Parameters:
      p1 - The first product.
      p2 - The second product.
      p3 - The third product.
